techmeme.title: Google DeepMind unveils Genie 2, a model that can generate 3D worlds from a single prompt image, playable by humans or AI agents using keyboard and mouse inputs (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Anduril and OpenAI partner to deploy advanced AI systems for national security missions, focusing on "improving the nation's counter-unmanned aircraft systems" (Hayden Field/CNBC)
Threads users can now follow fediverse accounts that have interacted with a Threads post, but the accounts aren't searchable and their posts won't show in feeds (Wes Davis/The Verge)
Trump selects Gail Slater, an adviser to JD Vance and tech policy adviser during Trump's first term, as head of the DOJ's antitrust unit (Josh Sisco/Bloomberg)
Trump plans to nominate former SEC Commissioner Paul Atkins as SEC chair, keeping with his promise for a crypto-friendly administration (Jeff Cox/CNBC)
